member.summary: The CSharp styles.

member.summary: Generates POCOs (Plain Old C# Objects).

member.summary: Generates classes implementing the interface.

member.name: T:NJsonSchema.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpDefaultValueGenerator
member.summary: Converts the default value to a TypeScript identifier.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:NJsonSchema.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpDefaultValueGenerator.GetDefaultValue(NJsonSchema.JsonSchema4,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the default value code.
member.param: Specifies whether the default value assignment also allows null.
The type name hint to use when generating the type and the type name is missing.
if set to true uses the default value from the schema if available.

member.summary: Converts the default value to a C# number literal.

member.name: T:NJsonSchema.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpGeneratorSettings
member.summary: The generator settings.

member.name: M:NJsonSchema.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpGeneratorSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpGeneratorSettings.Namespace
member.summary: Gets or sets the .NET namespace of the generated types.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpGeneratorSettings.RequiredPropertiesMustBeDefined
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a required property must be defined in JSON (sets Required.Always when the property is required) (default: true).

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpGeneratorSettings.GenerateDataAnnotations
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to generated data annotation attributes (default: true).

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpGeneratorSettings.DateType
member.summary: Gets or sets the date .NET type (default: 'DateTime').

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpGeneratorSettings.DateTimeType
member.summary: Gets or sets the date time .NET type (default: 'DateTime').

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpGeneratorSettings.TimeType
member.summary: Gets or sets the time .NET type (default: 'TimeSpan').

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpGeneratorSettings.TimeSpanType
member.summary: Gets or sets the time span .NET type (default: 'TimeSpan').

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpGeneratorSettings.ArrayType
member.summary: Gets or sets the generic array .NET type (default: 'ObservableCollection').

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpGeneratorSettings.DictionaryType
member.summary: Gets or sets the generic dictionary .NET type (default: 'Dictionary').

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpGeneratorSettings.ClassStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the CSharp class style (default: 'Poco').

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpGeneratorSettings.JsonConverters
member.summary: Gets or sets the custom Json.NET converters (class names) which are registered for serialization and deserialization.

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpGeneratorSettings.GenerateImmutableArrayProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to remove the setter for non-nullable array properties (default: false).

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpGeneratorSettings.GenerateImmutableDictionaryProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to remove the setter for non-nullable dictionary properties (default: false).

member.name: P:NJsonSchema.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpGeneratorSettings.HandleReferences
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use preserve references handling (All) in the JSON serializer (default: false).

member.name: T:NJsonSchema.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpJsonSerializerGenerator
member.summary: Generates JSON converter code.

member.name: M:NJsonSchema.CodeGeneration.CSharp.CSharpJsonSerializerGenerator.GenerateJsonSerializerParameterCode(System.Boolean,System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{System.String})
member.summary: Generates the JSON converter code.
member.param: if set to true uses preserve references handling.

member.summary: Generates the property name for a given CSharp .

member.summary: Generates the property name.

The type name hint to use when generating the type and the type name is missing.
